analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so //

analyzed: bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod //

analyzed: sras po bdud rtsi rnam grol rim gro pa // sengge'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste //
translated: His son will be called Immortality; his principal attendant will be known as Liberated.

original: gnas pa mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can //🔽'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang //🔽thams cad gnas shes pa la mkhas pa po //
analyzed: gnas pa mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang // thams cad gnas shes pa la mkhas pa po //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Lion’s Roar; the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Steadfast and Unwavering.

original: bye ba phrag ni sum cu lnga lnga yod //
analyzed: bye ba phrag ni sum cu lnga lnga yod //
translated: He will hold thirty-six assemblies, each numbering thirty-five times ten million of those who are skilled in the knowledge of remaining in meditative absorption.

original: mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin //
translated: The human life span will be thirty-six thousand years,

original: yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /
translated: and after the nirvana of this one who has arrived at the final goal, the holy Dharma will remain

original: lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas //
analyzed: lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas //
translated: for sixty-six thousand years.

original: sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig /
analyzed: sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig /

original: rin chen mchog gi dra bas mdzes par byas //
analyzed: rin chen mchog gi dra bas mdzes par byas //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i zhal skye ba'i; ;yul ni smra ba'i mchod rten zhes kyang bya //🔽de yi rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i zhal skye ba'i; ;yul ni smra ba'i mchod rten zhes kyang bya // de yi rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //

original: dpag tshad stong yod yab ni gzi brjid bzang //
analyzed: dpag tshad stong yod yab ni gzi brjid bzang //

original: gos la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
analyzed: gos la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
translated: the mother of the Jina will be called Joy in Clothing.

original: sras @464a *// po kha sgyur legs gnas rim gro pa //
analyzed: sras @464a *// po kha sgyur legs gnas rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be known as Changing Mouth; his principal attendant will be known as Abiding Well.

original: ye shes zil gyis gnon pa mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes zil gyis gnon pa mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Overwhelming Awareness;

original: mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Abiding Without Sorrow.

original: 'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang //

original: gti mug med pa'i pha mtha' phyin 'phags pa //🔽bye ba phrag ni bdun cu brgyad brgyad yod //
analyzed: gti mug med pa'i pha mtha' phyin 'phags pa // bye ba phrag ni bdun cu brgyad brgyad yod //
translated: of those who have reached the other shore of nondelusion.

original: mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin //
translated: The human life span will be seventy-four thousand years,

original: mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /
translated: and after the nirvana of this Jina,🔽the holy Dharma will remain

original: la grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: la grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur //
translated: for seventy thousand years.

original: 'gro ba'i don dang phan phyir rgyal ba yi //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don dang phan phyir rgyal ba yi //
translated: For the sake of the benefit and welfare of beings, the Victorious One🔽

original: sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: And the relics of this Jina will be extensive.

original: mi yi 'dren pa gtsug phud skye ba yi; ;yul ni rin chen brtsegs pa zhes kyang bya //🔽de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad /
analyzed: mi yi 'dren pa gtsug phud skye ba yi; ;yul ni rin chen brtsegs pa zhes kyang bya // de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad /

original: dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni tog bzang yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni tog bzang yin //
translated: He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for seventy yojanas.

original: snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
analyzed: snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Fine Topknot; the m other of the Jina will be known as Gift of Light.

analyzed: sras po lha legs sgra gcan rim gro pa // spobs pa dran pa blo gros can yin te //
translated: His son will be called Fine God; his principal attendant will be known as Rāhu.

original: rnam par sprul pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: rnam par sprul pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one of fine intelligence will be known as M anasendriya; the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Banner of Emanations.

original: 'dus pa lang grangs brgyad cu drug kun la'ang //
analyzed: 'dus pa lang grangs brgyad cu drug kun la'ang //

analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas mchog thob pa po // bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu bdun bdun yod //

original: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin //

original: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /
analyzed: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /
translated: and after the nirvana of this Jina, the holy Dharma

analyzed: lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur //

original: rgyal ba thugs rje chen po mtshungs med pa'i //
analyzed: rgyal ba thugs rje chen po mtshungs med pa'i //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive,

original: sku gdung dag ni rnam par gyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: sku gdung dag ni rnam par gyas par 'gyur //
translated: and there will be no equal to the Great Compassionate One.

original: mi'i 'dren pa snang ba mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: mi'i 'dren pa snang ba mdzad pa yi //
translated: The Leader of Men, Dipamkara,

analyzed: skye @464b pa'i yul ni gzi brjid grags zhes bya //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Glorious Fame.

original: rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will be

original: dpag tu med ba yab ni legs mthong yin //
analyzed: dpag tu med ba yab ni legs mthong yin //

original: blta bar 'os zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
analyzed: blta bar 'os zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
translated: the m other of the Jina will be known as Worthy to Behold.

original: sras po mthu rtsal mngar can rim gro pa //
analyzed: sras po mthu rtsal mngar can rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be known as Strength; his principal attendant will be known as Sweet.

original: snang bar byed pa blo gros can yin te //
analyzed: snang bar byed pa blo gros can yin te //

original: chags med gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: chags med gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Free of Attachment and Free of Ignorance.

original: 'dus pa thun mong ma yin dpag tu med //
analyzed: 'dus pa thun mong ma yin dpag tu med //
translated: His assemblies will be im m easurable and will not be ordinary.

original: mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad dpag tu med //🔽sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi //
analyzed: mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad dpag tu med // sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi //
translated: The hum an life span will be im m easurable.🔽He will do all that the ninety-nine times ninety-nine

original: mdzad pa ji snyed pa kun nges mdzad 'gyur //
analyzed: mdzad pa ji snyed pa kun nges mdzad 'gyur //
translated: Buddhas have done.

original: 'jig rten phan phyir sems can snying po dag /
analyzed: 'jig rten phan phyir sems can snying po dag /

original: mya ngan 'das nas dam chos gnas 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das nas dam chos gnas 'gyur ba'i //
translated: will pass beyond sorrow, and the holy Dharma will rem ain.

original: lo grangs stong phrag dag ni mtha' yang yas //
analyzed: lo grangs stong phrag dag ni mtha' yang yas //

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: Having spoken thus,

original: byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: the Bodhisattva Pramuditaraja said to the Lord,🔽“Excellent, excellent,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽legs so // legs so //🔽bskal pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / legs so // legs so // bskal pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang dang gang dag la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bskur stir bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lung bstan du gsol /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang dang gang dag la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bskur stir bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lung bstan du gsol /
translated: Blessed One, please prophesy the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the Fully Enlightened Ones, to whom those Blessed Buddhas of the good aeon first gave rise to the mind of enlightenment, and by what roots of virtue they, the Tathagatas, having honored them, gave rise to the mind of enlightenment.”🔽Having said this, the Lord said to the Bodhisattva Pramuditaraja,

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' @465a *//
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' @465a *//
translated: “Excellent, excellent,

original: ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ches bka' stsal to //
analyzed: ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ches bka' stsal to //
translated: son of noble family!

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /

original: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
translated: Therefore, listen well and keep it in mind, and I will explain it.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The bodhisattva Supreme Joy, King of the Dharma, said to the Blessed One,

original: de lta legs so //
analyzed: de lta legs so //
translated: Blessed One, that is excellent!

original: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Having said that, he listened as the Blessed One had instructed, and the Blessed One said this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis ni //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis ni //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla de la //

analyzed: gser las byas ba'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub phreng rgyud tshe //
translated: and first gave rise to the mind of awakening.🔽The Tathagata Kanakamuni, when he was a garland maker,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i stabs de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i stabs de la //

original: sna ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul //
analyzed: sna ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs 'od srung bram ze'i bur gyur tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs 'od srung bram ze'i bur gyur tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la // ska rags dag ni dbul bar byas nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: nga ni sngon tshe sman par gyur pa na //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub de la // 'jams gang zhig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor lo sgyur ba yi //

analyzed: rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces byar gyur pa na //

analyzed: bde gshegs mthu chen gdugs tshod dag la spyan @465b drangs nas // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dag gis ni //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro snyan de la //

analyzed: bde gshegs rab gsal tshor bar gyur pa'i tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la //

analyzed: nor bu rin po che dag phul nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub pa tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub pa tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad gzigs de la //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs khyim bdag tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs lag chen rol mo mkhan gyur tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa mchog grags grong khyer du //
